string-array.item: Knights are the leaders of your army so its most important to
Resource is your 1st priority if you want to
Watch Youtube Videos of Blaze of Battle

string-array.name: place_details
string-array.item: Knights are the leaders of your army so its most important to upgrade them, knight will give you various king of boost if assign to a specific position.Upgrading knight is not easy it will give you only 5000 xp per attack so here is a video that will show how to upgrade knight without hurting your finger :P

Dragon Tricks: How to kill Monsters: Its quite difficult to kill a level-3 or higher monster, so to kill it easily you need to boost the alliance bonus.
